name.description: Tool name (used as a directory name)

description.description: A short (one sentence) description of the tool.

export_vars.description: Some variable expansions are done on the values. 1) ${TOOL_PATH} is replaced with the directory where the tool is installed.

info_url.description: URL of the page with information about the tool

install.description: If 'always', the tool will be installed by default. If 'on_request', tool will be installed when specifically requested. If 'never', tool will not be considered for installation.

is_executable.description: If false - tool does not contain executables. The version will not be checked but export_vars applied.

license.description: License name. Use SPDX license identifier if it exists, short name of the license otherwise.

version_cmd.description: Command to be executed (along with any extra arguments). The executable be present in one of the export_paths.

supported_targets.description: Array of esp_targets that this tool is needed for.

version_regex.description: Regex which is to be applied to version_cmd output to extract the version. By default, the version will be the first capture group of the expression. If version_regex_replace is specified, version will be obtained by doing a substitution using version_regex_replace instead.

version_regex_replace.description: If given, this will be used as substitute expression for the regex defined in version_regex, to obtain the version string. Not specifying this is equivalent to setting it to '\1' (i.e. return the first capture group).

strip_container_dirs.description: If specified, this number of top directory levels will removed when extracting. E.g. if strip_container_dirs=2, archive path a/b/c/d.txt will be extracted as c/d.txt

arrayOfStrings.description: Array of strings. Used to represent paths (split into components) and command lines (split into arguments)

exportPaths.description: Array of paths to be exported (added to PATH). Each item in the array is relative to the directory where the tool will be installed.

envVars.description: Collection of environment variables. Keys and values are the environment variable names and values, respectively.

name.description: Version name (used as a directory name)

status.description: Determines whether the version is recommended/supported/deprecated

platformDownloadInfo.description: Information about download artifact for one platform

size.description: Size of the file, in bytes

rename_dist.description: Filename under which the archive should be downloaded

installRequirementInfo.description: If 'always', the tool will be installed by default. If 'on_request', tool will be installed when specifically requested. If 'never', tool will not be considered for installation.

platformOverrideInfo.description: Platform-specific values which override the defaults

platforms.description: List of platforms to which this override applies

$comment: Condition verifying that version 1 of tools.json must not contain 'rename_dist' keyword in any of #/definitions/versionInfo properties.
